references.reason: This paper introduces the denoising diffusion probabilistic models (DDPMs), a fundamental technique used in the proposed trajectory diffusion model for generating trajectories.

references.paper_title: Matterport3D: Learning from RGB-D data in indoor environments
references.reason: This paper introduces the Matterport3D dataset, one of the two main datasets used for evaluating the proposed trajectory diffusion model.

references.paper_title: Gibson env: Real-world perception for embodied agents
references.reason: This paper introduces the Gibson environment, one of the two main environments used for evaluating the proposed trajectory diffusion model.

references.paper_title: PONI: potential functions for objectgoal navigation with interaction-free learning
references.reason: This paper proposes PONI, a modular method for object goal navigation, which is used as a baseline for comparing the performance of the proposed trajectory diffusion model.

references.paper_title: Habitat-Web: Learning embodied object-search strategies from human demonstrations at scale
references.reason: This paper introduces the Habitat-Web dataset and a baseline method for object goal navigation, which are used for evaluating and comparing the performance of the proposed trajectory diffusion model.
